text:
Senior Backend Engineer | Pinger | ONSITE | Full-time | VISA | Downtown San Jose, CA

Right now our team is currently working to improve our code quality (SOLID principles, dependency injection, clean code, domain driven design, etc.) and test coverage (at multiple levels) in an effort to reach full CI/CD. We are working with PHP among other technologies. We are looking for one more team member.

https://www.pinger.com/jobs/
